alert.note: Alert for Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Madison River Valley; Northwest Beaverhead County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 04 at 1:05AM MST until December 05 at 8:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 6 inches. * WHERE...Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains, Madison River Valley and Northwest Beaverhead County. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 8 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Madison River Valley; Northwest Beaverhead County
